briefTitle: MRI in Ductal Carcinoma in Situ (DCIS)
officialTitle: Relevance of Mammary MRI in the Preoperative Assessment of Ductal Carcinoma in Situ (DCIS)
primaryOutcomeMeasure: The investigators compare the estimate of the lesional size in MRI to that in mammography, taking as a reference the definitive anatomo-pathological size
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Age ≥18 ans
* Woman with DCIS

Exclusion Criteria:

* Age ≥18 ans)
